import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={projectText:'New project ⇧⌘P',expandText:'Expand all',collapseText:'Collapse all',expand:false};export var menuReducer=createSlice({name:'menu',initialState:initialState,reducers:{expand:function expand(state){state.expand=true;console.log('expand clicked!');},collapse:function collapse(state){state.expand=false;console.log('collapse clicked!');},addProject:function addProject(state){// TODO
console.log('addProject clicked!');}}});var _menuReducer$actions=menuReducer.actions,expand=_menuReducer$actions.expand,collapse=_menuReducer$actions.collapse,addProject=_menuReducer$actions.addProject;export{expand,collapse,addProject};export var selectProjectText=function selectProjectText(state){return state.menu.projectText;};export var selectExpandText=function selectExpandText(state){return state.menu.expandText;};export var selectCollapseText=function selectCollapseText(state){return state.menu.collapseText;};export default menuReducer.reducer;
